In the Egyptian stele shown, the imagery is organized in which of the following ways?

choices.label: As a diptych framed by an outline
As composite figures placed in registers
As a continuous narrative displayed in columns
As multiple scenes presented in one-point perspective

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
